attributes.action: Extend the circumstances in which MPs can be recalled
attributes.additional_details: Democracy is failing when parties insist that MPs vote according to party lines.  Each MP should be responsible for carrying out their responsibilities in accordance with their own conscience.  Constituents should have more opportunities than once every five years to recall their MP if their voting record flagrantly goes against their constituents wishes
attributes.background: Government should represent the will of the people and act accordingly

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure in what new circumstances you'd like recall to be available to constituents. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
